channel.title: Machine Learning on Rayncloud.com
channel.description: Recent content in Machine Learning on Rayncloud.com

item.title: Deep Learning Generalization
item.description: Deep neural networks represent an interesting puzzle when viewed from the perspective of statistical learning theory. Specifically, it is difficult to account for their ability to generalize well.

item.title: A machine learning taxonomy
item.description: These working notes are formatted as a taxonomy of machine learning, with a natural focus on research areas of interest to me. They are meant as a way of organizing my knowledge, open questions, and useful references related to machine learning.
